maestro.configuration.maestro_enabled.to: Whether Maestro custom music should be active at all. When turned off, only vanilla music will be played.
maestro.configuration.vanilla_enabled.to:
Whether vanilla music should be active at all. When turned off, music can only be played via Maestro Definitions.

Intended for advanced users who want full control from a clean slate.
maestro.configuration.debug_overlay.tool:
Renders a debug overlay showing the current music layer state. Displays active tracks, silence, and suppression.

Intended for debugging and development.
